description: Ms. codex. Title supplied by the cataloger. Written in small nastaʻlīq in black ink with use of red. Written surface varies. Catchwords present in most texts. Glazed European paper. An ownership signature, accompanied by a seal, in the name of Molla Sayyid Mehmet "protected by" Lalaʹzade on fol. 1a.
abstract: A collection of tratises in a variety of subjects, including tafsīr, theology, philosophy, metaphysics, semantics and science of time-keeping. Most are in Arabic, with few texts in Ottoman. Only texts 17 and 20 are dated, 3rd of Rajab 1096 and first 10 days of Rajab 1096 respectively (1685). Most texts are in same hand, appear to be contemporary and vary only slightly in style and layout.
contents: 3. Fol. 3a: [Ḥadīth "taken from Ḥāshiyat al-Kashshāf by Shaykh Akmal al-Dīn" and a short wird by Ibn al-ʻArabī]
5. Fol. 7b: Manlā Aḥmad al-Anṣārī ʻalá qawl al-Bayḍāwī [title from the table of contents].
8. Fol. 9b-13b: Risālah mutaʻalliqah bi-iṣṭilaḥāt arbāb al-ḥadīth.
11. Fol. 21a: Maqādīr sharʻīyah [title from the table of contents].
12. Fol. 22a-24a: Tafsīr kabīr min Sūrat al-Aḥzāb.
15. Fol. 32b-37a: Risālah fī radd al-Risālah al-Walāʼīyah.
23. Fol. 65a: [an inscription concerning verses (in a risālah) coined by Ḥabīb Allāh Mīrzā Jān (d. 1586?)]
25. Fol. 72a-80b: Risālah fī taḥqīq al-kalām fī mawqif al-maʼmūm wa-al-imām.
27. Fol. 84b-86a: Şeyhülislam hazretlerine maruz-i fakir (in Ottoman).
29. Fol. 89a-90a: Taʻlīqah ʻalá qānūn al-khabr min al-miftāḥ lil-ʻAfīf [title from the table of contents].
31. Fol. 91b: [a short paragraph containing a list of excerpts from a number of different works]
33. Fol. 93a-93b: Qānūn al-khabr min miftāḥ al-ʻulūm.
35. Fol. 96a: [a short text on ʻilm al-uṣūl]
38. Fol. 99b-112a: Esrârname [title from the table of contents; the text is a risālah (in Ottoman) in metaphysics, and includes commentaries on a selection of ḥadīth]
40. Fol. 123a-125a: al-ʻIddah fī al-nisāʼ wa-al-rijāl [title from the table of contents; the text (in Ottoman) is an exposition by Ebussuud Efendi on the 'waiting time' between marriages]
extent: 130 leaves : paper ; 212 x 135 (130-160 x 65-105) mm. bound to 212 x 138 mm.
provenance: Originally acquired by Robert Garrett from Abraham Shalom Yahuda ; 1942.
subject: Qurʼan—Criticism, interpretation, etc—Early works to 1800
binding_note: Brown leather. Gold guilloche and fillets around borders of covers. Gold tooled mesh pattern in diamond shape in the centre of upper and lower covers. Marbled paper pastedowns. Label on upper cover: "Majāmiʻ 27".
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
